system.note: Respirators and Sealed Armour grant no bonuses against the nerve-agents these grenades release. If Toughness Test to resist Hallucinogenics if failed, add +1 to Hallucinogen Roll per Degree of Failiure (max 10)

description.value:
Special: Blast (3), Hallucinogenic (4)

Note: Respirators and Sealed Armour grant no bonuses against the nerve-agents these grenades release. If Toughness Test to resist Hallucinogenics if failed, add +1 to Hallucinogen Roll per Degree of Failiure (max 10)
